mapper.select: SELECT pc.*, u.username, u.user_avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_comments WHERE parent_comment_id = pc.id) as reply_count FROM page_comments pc INNER JOIN users u ON pc.user_id = u.id WHERE pc.id = #{id}

SELECT pc.*, u.username, u.user_avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_comments WHERE parent_comment_id = pc.id) as reply_count FROM page_comments pc INNER JOIN users u ON pc.user_id = u.id WHERE pc.page_id = #{id} AND pc.parent_comment_id IS NULL ORDER BY pc.created_at ${sortType} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_comments WHERE parent_comment_id = #{id}

SELECT pc.*, u.username, u.user_avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_comments WHERE parent_comment_id = pc.id) as reply_count FROM page_comments pc INNER JOIN users u ON pc.user_id = u.id WHERE pc.parent_comment_id = #{id} ORDER BY pc.created_at ASC LIMIT #{i1} OFFSET #{i}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_comments WHERE page_id = #{pageId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_comments pc INNER JOIN project_pages pp ON pc.page_id = pp.id WHERE pp.assigned_user_id = #{userId}
